GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves specific article object by its id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments by its article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the specified article
